description: Scenario for Docker setup tutorial with installation and daemon issues

responses.problem: Command 'docker' not found. Docker does not appear to be installed.
responses.questionForMentor: The tutorial asks me to run 'docker --version' but the command is not found. How do I install Docker?
responses.summary: Cannot proceed - Docker is not installed

responses.problem: Cannot connect to the Docker daemon at unix:///var/run/docker.sock. Is the docker daemon running?
responses.questionForMentor: Docker is installed but I get 'Cannot connect to the Docker daemon'. How do I start Docker?
responses.summary: Docker installed but daemon not running

responses.problem: Got permission denied while trying to connect to the Docker daemon socket at unix:///var/run/docker.sock
responses.questionForMentor: I get 'permission denied' when running docker commands. Do I need to use sudo or add myself to a group?
responses.summary: Docker daemon running but permission denied
Tutorial completed after resolving permission issues
